fields.headline: We like ...
fields.bodyText: We like companies growing in confidence with figures that beat market expectations. Reed Elsevier, the Anglo-Dutch publisher specialising in educational and scientific publications has struggled in recent years. However, recent figures pointed to the group being back on course and this was accompanied with an upbeat statement on future earnings growth. The generally conservative Smiths Group has also been more positive. This specialist engineer, principally involved in the medical and aerospace sectors, has seen growing sales, helped by faster than expected recovery in civil aerospace. The acquisition of Medex will take Smiths into the major league of US medical businesses. · Head of investment at The Share Centre, tel: 01296 41 41 41 or share.com
